text: agar tum sachche ho to zara samajh ke mujhe batao aur oont ke (nar maada) do aur gaay ke (nar maada) do (ai rasool tum unase) poochho ki khuda ne un donon (oont gaay ke) naron ko haraam kiya ya donon maadaniyonko ya us bachche ko jo donon maadaniyon ke pet apane andar liye hue hai kya jis vakt khuda ne tumako usaka hukm diya tha tum us vakt maujood the phir jo khuda par jhooth botaahan bodhe usase jyaada zaalim kaun hoga taaki logon ke ve samajhe boojhe gumaraah karen khuda haragiz zaalim qaum mein manzile maqasood tak nahin pahuchaata
